colour: This hat is appropriate to wear during the day. With your friends at the beach. At the mall. With your cat. Or your favourite pair of shoes.
This style is great when you're going to the bar or being hooligans with your hipster friends. The dark colours help you blend in with the night.
This hat is great for playing dress up with your little cousins. Dancing around to Taylor Swift. And pretending that you are an animal. Fierce.

comments.comment: I love this hat. Bought it for my cat.

colour: I wear this when I'm cold, which is often. It's starting to smell, I wear it so often. Often. Good song. Stay cozy with this soft piece of love.

comments.comment: I love this hat. Bought three of em.

colour: Another country, another me. I've transformed here and this hat is part of my new identity. I'm ambitious. I whip my hair back and forth.

comments.comment: Wear this when i eat cheetos

colour: Siblings hats are the way to go when your rolling your eyes and don't want mother to see. We are hoodlems with good grades.
